---

## About ScreenFlow

ScreenFlow represents the professional solution for screen recording and video editing, offering comprehensive capture capabilities combined with intuitive editing tools across both macOS and Windows platforms. This powerful screen recording software provides high-quality video capture of desktop activities, application windows, and camera input while delivering professional-grade editing features that transform raw recordings into polished productions. The seamless workflow integration combined with advanced production tools makes ScreenFlow the preferred choice for educators, content creators, software developers, and businesses seeking to create engaging video content with professional production values.

The software's sophisticated feature set includes multi-source recording that captures screen activity, camera feed, and audio simultaneously, advanced editing capabilities with precise timeline control, and extensive export options optimized for various platforms and distribution channels. Whether you're creating software tutorials, recording online presentations, producing training materials, developing marketing videos, or capturing gameplay footage, ScreenFlow delivers exceptional performance with the flexibility needed for diverse recording scenarios. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent recording and editing experiences whether working on macOS systems or Windows computers, while the optimized encoding preserves video quality while maintaining efficient file sizes for sharing and distribution.

## ‚ú® ScreenFlow Advantages

üìπ **Multi-Source Recording** - Simultaneous capture of screen, camera, and audio sources

üé¨ **Advanced Timeline** - Professional editing with layers, transitions, and keyframe animation

üé§ **Audio Enhancement** - Noise reduction, audio leveling, and voiceover recording tools

üñºÔ∏è **Visual Effects** - Annotations, callouts, zoom and pan effects for engaging content

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 8GB RAM minimum (16GB recommended for HD/4K editing)
- 2GB available storage space for application and project files
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Dedicated graphics card recommended for smooth editing performance

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture required)
- 8GB RAM (16GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 2GB available storage space
- DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
- Adequate storage for video files and rendered projects
